item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, April 25, 2024 at 10:00 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Europeans ‘less hard-working’ than Americans, says Norway oil fund boss
2. Harvey Weinstein’s rape conviction in New York overturned on appeal
3. Biden dealt blow as investors scale back bets on pre-election rate cut
4. BHP proposes £31bn takeover of Anglo American in mining mega-deal
5. Jefferies boss sells $65mn in stock to buy a customer’s yacht
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, April 25, 2024 at 10:00 PM UTC
